page.title: 10POPULATION
page.content: THE OTHER MEMBER OF STAFF AT THE SCHOOL IS MRS CATHCART THE CARETAKER AND KITCHEN STAFF. SHE IS EMPLOYED TO OPEN AND CLOSE THE SCHOOL AND TIDY IT DAILY AND TO INFORM THE HEAD TEACHER OF ANY REPAIRS NEEDING DONE. AT LUNCH TIME SHE HEATS THE LUNCHES WHICH COME FROM A CENTRAL KITCHEN IN DUNDEE AND SETS THE DINING ROOM FOR LUNCH. ON AVERAGE DURING WINTER THERE ARE 14 STAY FOR LUNCH AND IN SUMMER 8 WITH 4 BRINGING PACKED LUNCHES.AFTER LUNCH MRS CATHCART WASHES THE DISHES AND TIDIES THE DINING ROOM READY FOR THE NEXT DAY.MRS CATHCART IS ALSO RESPONSIBLE FOR OPENING THE SCHOOL FOR ANY OF THE MEETINGS OR CLUBS HELD IN THE SCHOOL.THE HALL AND ANY OTHER ROOMS USED DURING THE DAY ARE CLEANED AND REORGANISED FOR THE NEXT DAY.
